page.title: 11CHANGING TIMES (CONT)
page.content: and they are in colour.There are still pantomimes, Operatic Societies,and Theatres. FASHION-The clothes people wore were more uniform. Everyone had working clothes and one best set of clothes, unlike today, where people tend to have lots of clothes and each has his own individual fashion. Meen wore dark suits and the women long flared skirts and blouses. FOOD- most people made their own, as there was not the range of tinned and packaged food availble. Favourite were broth, 'tattie-pot'and stew. OPINIONS- Most people interviewed thoughtthat teachers were stricter in the past and that this was a good thing.The police also had a better idea about their own local neighbourhood. Most people preferred life as it was in their youth.
